record.title: PROGRAM

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, Senators should be prepared to start voting at about 4 p.m. on Monday. In fact, it will be 4 p.m. Monday because any--we have the prayer time. I ask the Chair, are the prayer and the pledge counted as part of the hour before the cloture vote?

record.chair: The majority leader is correct. It does count toward the hour.

speaking.paragraph: So I would say to everyone, they should be pretty well informed that we will vote at 4 o'clock. Unless something comes up that I do not foresee, we will start voting at 4 o'clock.
